google_translated: This is a happy end-like mood ...

en_text: but are you really sure this outcome should be viewed as a happy ending?
jp_text: こんな落ちがハッピーエンドとして成立していいんでしょうか
google_translated: Do you want to hold such a fall as a happy end?

en_text: Kyoya-senpai, why are you on top of a mushroom?
jp_text: どうも一人だけ展開についてこれていないようだなぁ
google_translated: It seems that only one person is expanding.

en_text: It looks like you're not keeping up with the storyline on your own, huh?
jp_text: 桜蘭高校ホストクラブ 来週も
google_translated: Sakuran High School Host Club Next Week

en_text: Ouran High School Host Club will be waiting for you, next week!
jp_text: お待ちしております
google_translated: We'll be expecting you
